sourcesContent:
import "./EventItem.css"; const EventItem = (props) => { return (

{props.author}

@{props.author}

{props.sport} #{props.level}
City:{props.city}
{props.location.length >= 2 ? Location: {props.location} : ''}
{props.description}

  • Date

    {props.date}

  • Start:

    {props.time}

  • Joined

    {props.nrPlayers}

  • Who can join:

    {props.allowed === 'Everyone' ? 'Everyone' : `${props.level}`}

); }; export default EventItem;
